name: The Asylum
description:
The Asylum i s a game i made in my spare time. it is still in development.

I am trying to create a retro feel for the game which is more involved with gameplay rather than stunning graphics.

This is the first release of the game and it will be constantly evolving, getting larger and better.

Once this game is complete i aim to ask the community what they would like to see in a game and i will try to incorporate that.

Now onto the game.

You are locked alone in an abandoned asylum, all you have is your trusty flashlight and what ever else you can find around to use to help you find your way out before your life itself is forfeight.

The asylum MAY be abandoned but it is NOT unoccupied.
